item.title: Shortcodes
item.description:
In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality.

Alert

alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Diagrams and Flowcharts
item.description: It’s easy to add diagrams and flowcharts to articles using Mermaid.
